<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nagaji Spell Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=3984) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nagaji" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=359" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 49</row>

</column>

---

Either through study, exposure, or familial devotion, you have the magic of [nagas](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=75) bubbling in your blood. During your daily preparations, choose [_daze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), or [_mage hand_](/Spells.aspx?ID=177). Until your next daily preparations, you can cast the chosen spell as an occult innate cantrip. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
name: Nagaji Spell Familiarity
